Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Southbound Reroute near 74th/Racine
ShortDescription: Southbound  44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 74th, Loomis, 76th and Racine: due to, street blockage near 74th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound  #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 74th, Loomis, 76th and Racine: due to, street blockage near 74th/Racine.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 74th/Racine
ShortDescription: Westbound 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th and Loomis: due to, street blockage near 74th/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 74th and Loomis: due to, street blockage near 74th/Racine.

Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at California/45th
ShortDescription: #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Kedzie, Archer and California, due to fire department activity near California/45th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 47th, Kedzie, Archer and California, then resume their normal route: due to fire department activity near California/45th.

Allow extra travel time.
